lead_paragraph: The American fertilizer maker CF Industries said that it had called off an $8 billion deal to acquire operations from OCI of the Netherlands.

headline.print_headline: CF Industries Scraps a Deal Aimed to Cut Its Tax Rates
headline.main: Fertilizer Deal Called Off Over New Tax Inversion Rules

snippet: The American fertilizer maker CF Industries said that it had called off an $8 billion deal to acquire operations from OCI of the Netherlands.
abstract: Fertilizer maker CF Industries says it has called off $8 billion deal to buy several European and North American operations from OCI of Netherlands due to crackdown by Treasury Dept on so-called tax inversions.
